name: Hazelcast Ilist Connector
shortDescription: Reads and adds items to a distributed list (IList) in local or remote Hazelcast cluster.
longDescription: Reads items retrieved from a Hazelcast IList. All elements are read on a single member of a Jet cluster — IList isn’t partitioned. Sink adds items to the IList.  The connector is included in the base Jet package. No plugin download is required.
